extendedInfo.description: Do you have any U.S., Canadian, Mexican, or French coins?  Some of those coins are up to 100% silver in weight and now sell for up to 30 U.S. dollars.This calculator will help you convert between silver pieces, U.S. dollars, Euros, Canadian dollars, Mexican pesos, and Bitcoin.Find out the prices of bullion pieces and "junk silver" coins from various mints including:- pre-1965 US dimes, quarters, half dollars, and dollars;- 1920-1967 Canadian dimes, quarters, half dollars, and dollars;- American Silver Eagles;- Canadian Maple Leafs;- Mexican Libertades; and,- Shire Silver, Silver Circle, and Del Valley Silver, and much more!Don't see silver pieces or a currency that you're looking for?  Let us know.* NOTEThis application requires the android.permission.INTERNET permission in order to access the latest silver price and Bitcoin data from the Internet.

reviews.title: Terrific
reviews.comment: Please,  please, please make a gold app as well.   Your silver app is great and just keeps getting better as you add coins.   If you would make a gold app integrated with this silver I would gladly buy it for $5, and worth every penny!
reviews.author: Alton Young

reviews.comment: Almost accurately calculates silver value. Spot price is usually a cent or three off of Kitco.\tWould really like to see you add in Walking liberty and Morgan silver dollars.    You NEED to fix the issue that causes all the coins to clear when the screen auto rotates. Seems to do it everytime the screen goes from portrait to landscape view. Otherwise, excellent app!
reviews.author: Christopher schuman

reviews.title: Silver Calc
reviews.comment: Would like to solve payments into 1oz & fractional .999 measures; but great work none the less.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Handy app
reviews.comment: This is really good for quick checking old coins.  A gold soon would be great.  Just need to point out though, that after 1970 the us half dollars don\'t have any silver in them.
reviews.author: willie burch

reviews.title: Love the app
reviews.comment: Would have given 5 stars if it would give a total if silver when you input your coins
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: very good
reviews.comment: and actualy you can see the total weight of silver you have under settings
reviews.author: jan toben

reviews.title: Wish it had more coins
reviews.comment: I\'d like to see the Walking Liberty, Morgan Silver Dollar, and many other coins.
reviews.author: Tim Morris

reviews.title: Garbage
reviews.comment: Thanks to this app I was able to turn 60 dollars into 11! It was increadible! I thought I was using something that calculated the value of silver, but upon closer inspection after doing some real research, hal dollars 1971-1976 are not silver at all. Id give this app 0 stars and force you all to give me the 50 bucks I just lost.
reviews.author: Joseph Robb

reviews.title: Beware
reviews.comment: This application shows silver content for a 1972 Kennedy half dollar, and a 1976 Kennedy half dollar.  There is NO SILVER CONTENT IN THESE COINS!!!!!!!!! USER beware!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User
